description.narrative: Environmental Governance and Sustainable Development Project in Wuhai, Inner Mongolia
seat of a second-order administrative division

activity-description.narrative: all residents in Wuhai, Inner Mongolia.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: 1.1. One Baseline Research Report on Environmental Condition and Mining Industry Development Situation and Potentials 1.2. 5 Research Reports on the best practices of Environment Governance of Domestic Resource-exhausted cities (Shanxi, Shaanxi, Liaoning, Sichuan and Inner Mongolia) 1.3. 5 Research Reports on the best practices of Environment Governance of Abroad Resource-exhausted cities (Germany, USA, South Africa, Central Asia and Europe) 1.4 4 policy recommendations on mining, environment remediation and sustainable development of Wuhai 1.5 2 typical report on environmental comprehensive Governance and economic transformation of Wuhai 2.1. At least 250 persons with increased knowledge on Green Construction (Coal mining, washing, coking, deep processing), at least 35% women. 2.2 Existence of status of green mining technical report 2.3 Existence of a an research report on coal mining subsidence area 2.4. Existence of a Technical Assistance Report on the application of “Green Park” 3.1. 1 Investigation and Research Report on energy consumption, pollution and emission of key industries in Wuhai 3.2. At least 20 persons with increased knowledge on low carbon development (4 workshops on Low-carbon development and Technical Route of Wuhai) 3.3 1 Wuhai Low-carbon development Green Book 3.4 At least 5 staff selected among 7 key emission enterprises with increased knowledge on Carbon trading and carbon management 3.5 At least3 local low-carbon experts with increased knowledge (at least one woman) 4.1. 1 investigation and research report on energy-saving and emission reduction policies and action plans of Wuhai (Financial Policies, Financing Products, Carbon Financing Policies, innovation feasibility of Carbon Financing products) 4.2 1 Research Report on Wuhai sustainable and green financing model 4.3 1 Research Report on green carbon financing development encouragement policies and measures of Wuhai 4.4 1 Wuhai Green Carbon Financing Research Report 5.1 1 feasibili

comment.narrative: 1.1. One Baseline Research Report on Environmental Condition and Mining Industry Development Situation and Potentials 0 2017 1.2. 5 Research Reports on the best practices of Environment Governance of Domestic Resource-exhausted cities (Shanxi, Shaanxi, Liaoning, Sichuan and Inner Mongolia) 0 2017 1.3. 5 Research Reports on the best practices of Environment Governance of Abroad Resource-exhausted cities (Germany, USA, South Africa, Central Asia and Europe) 0 2017 1.4 4 policy recommendations on mining, environment remediation and sustainable development of Wuhai 0 2017 1.5 2 typical report on environmental comprehensive Governance and economic transformation of Wuhai 0 2017 2.1. At least 250 persons with increased knowledge on Green Construction (Coal mining, washing, coking, deep processing), at least 35% women. 0 2017 2.2 Existence of status of green mining technical report 0 2017 2.3 Existence of a an research report on coal mining subsidence area 0 2017 2.4. Existence of a Technical Assistance Report on the application of “Green Park” 0 2017 3.1. 1 Investigation and Research Report on energy consumption, pollution and emission of key industries in Wuhai 0 2017 3.2. At least 20 persons with increased knowledge on low carbon development (4 workshops on Low-carbon development and Technical Route of Wuhai) 0 2017 3.3 1 Wuhai Low-carbon development Green Book 0 2017 3.4 At least 5 staff selected among 7 key emission enterprises with increased knowledge on Carbon trading and carbon management 0 2017 3.5 At least3 local low-carbon experts with increased knowledge (at least one woman) 0 2017 4.1. 1 investigation and research report on energy-saving and emission reduction policies and action plans of Wuhai (Financial Policies, Financing Products, Carbon Financing Policies, innovation feasibility of Carbon Financing products) 0 2017 4.2 1 Research Report on Wuhai sustainable and green financing model 0 2017 4.3 1 Research Report on green carbon financing development

- Policies and management frameworks related to the development planning of Wuhais production sectors strengthened - Wuhai City has the tools in place to become one of the first cities to be certified as a “green mining pilot” as per Chinese regulation. - Successful implementation of low carbon actions, low carbon tools in place, and relevant persons with increased knowledge in low carbon technology and initiatives. - Pilots of hydrogen economy and carbon circular economy conducted. - Pilots on carbon circular economy, including carbon capture and utilisation. - Methodology in carbon emission reduction by fuel cells application in transportation sector in place. - Eco-tourism initiatives in place and/or strengthened. - Sustainable governance mode of mining area established and promoted by carrying out solid waste management in mining areas. - Capacity of Wuhai City in wetland management effectively strengthened. - New business model for Wuhai residents researched and demonstrated, and livelihood opportunities for men and women indigenous people strengthened. - Capacity of Wuhan City in planning and implementing environment education and communications effectively strengthened.

- Policies and management frameworks related to the development planning of Wuhais production sectors strengthened - Wuhai City has the tools in place to become one of the first cities to be certified as a “green mining pilot” as per Chinese regulation. - Successful implementation of low carbon actions, low carbon tools in place, and relevant persons with increased knowledge in low carbon technology and initiatives. - Pilots of hydrogen economy and carbon circular economy condudcted. - Pilots on carbon circular economy, including carbon capture and utilisation. - Methodology in carbon emission reduction by fuel cells application in transportation sector in place. - Eco-tourism initiatives in place and/or strengthened. - Sustainable governance mode of mining area established and promoted by carrying out solid waste management in mining areas. - Capacity of Wuhai City in wetland management effectively strengthened. - New business model for Wuhai residents researched and demonstrated, and livelihood opportunities for men and women indigenous people strengthened. - Capacity of Wuhan City in planning and implementing environment education and communications effectively strengthened.

Project was put on hold dur to the COVID impact and was further reviewed during the PSC thereby closed upon all parties agreement. The project closure was in light of the relatively stagnant progress and communication process at the field Project Implementation Office end, since its launch.
project operational closed in 2021 and will be financially closed in 2022.
